original_text: She does not think about the way that leads to true life. She has lost the right road but she does not understand what she is doing.
korean_text: 그는 생명의 평탄한 길을 찾지 못하며 자기 길이 든든하지 못하여도 그것을 깨닫지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: She does not think about the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그 길에 대해 생각하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: She has lost the right road
